Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie was pale by comparison to some great Disney fairy tales like Cinderella and Beauty and Beast .
Fortunately there was one saving grace in this pretty traditional version of Brother's Grimm story: the music. Especially those sung by birds were looking really good with their tasteful use of butterflies and twirls.
